run_info.output: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has announced new tools for building with generative artificial intelligence (AI). The tools include Amazon SageMaker, a fully managed service that provides developers and data scientists with the ability to build, train, and deploy machine learning models quickly, and Amazon Elastic Inference, which allows developers to add GPU acceleration to any Amazon EC2 instance for faster inference. Additionally, AWS has launched a new generative AI service called Amazon SageMaker Autopilot, which automatically trains and tunes machine learning models for developers. These new tools aim to make it easier for developers to build and deploy generative AI models on AWS.

The tools include Amazon SageMaker, a fully managed service that provides developers and data scientists with the ability to build, train, and deploy machine learning models quickly, and Amazon Elastic Inference, which allows developers to add GPU acceleration to any Amazon EC2 instance for faster inference. These new tools aim to make it easier for developers to build and deploy generative AI models on AWS.

Summary:

message.content: Amazon Web Services (AWS) has announced new tools for building with generative artificial intelligence (AI). The tools include Amazon SageMaker, a fully managed service that provides developers and data scientists with the ability to build, train, and deploy machine learning models quickly, and Amazon Elastic Inference, which allows developers to add GPU acceleration to any Amazon EC2 instance for faster inference. Additionally, AWS has launched a new generative AI service called Amazon SageMaker Autopilot, which automatically trains and tunes machine learning models for developers. These new tools aim to make it easier for developers to build and deploy generative AI models on AWS.

Additionally, AWS has launched a new generative AI service called Amazon SageMaker Autopilot, which automatically trains and tunes machine learning models for developers. These new tools aim to make it easier for developers to build and deploy generative AI models on AWS.
